#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;

char s[100005];

int main()
{
	scanf("%s",s);
	int N=strlen(s), cnt = 1;
	int maxi = -1;
	char ch;
	for(int i=1; i<=N ;i++)
	{
		if(s[i]!=s[i-1])
		{
			if(cnt>maxi || (cnt == maxi && ch>s[i-1]))
			{
				maxi = cnt;
				ch = s[i-1];
			}
			cnt = 1;
		}
		else cnt++;
	}
	printf("%c\n%d\n",ch,maxi);
}
